item.title: The Beach Boys - I Can Hear Music - Key of D - Ukulaliens - Ukulele Club
item.description: Play along video for the song I Can Hear Music by The Beach Boys from the channel Ukulaliens - Ukulele Club. Chords used in the song: A, A7, D, D7, Em, F♯m, G, Gm.

item.title: The Beach Boys - In My Room - Key of C - Daniel Simmons
item.description: Play along video for the song In My Room by The Beach Boys from the channel Daniel Simmons. Chords used in the song: Am, B♭, C, Dm, G, G7.

item.title: The Beach Boys - Good Vibrations - Key of G - ukeplayalongs
item.description: Play along video for the song Good Vibrations by The Beach Boys from the channel ukeplayalongs. Chords used in the song: A, A7, B7, B♭, C, C7, D, Dm, E, F, F♯m, G.

item.title: The Ventures - Wipe Out - Key of C - ukeplayalongs
item.description: Play along video for the song Wipe Out by The Ventures from the channel ukeplayalongs. Chords used in the song: C, F, G, G7.

item.title: The Beach Boys - Barbara Ann - Key of G - ukeplayalongs
item.description: Play along video for the song Barbara Ann by The Beach Boys from the channel ukeplayalongs. Chords used in the song: C, D, G.

item.title: Hawaii Five-O Ukulele Play-Along! - Ukulele Underground
